Articles.Content:
Oh my, it was a bumpy ride

Let me introduce myself, as you can see my username is Fluburtur but my real name is Thomas, if ever someone wants to call me that way (I don't know why but people are hard to understand sometimes)

Im a 18 years old dude from France and I played the game for more than a year now, so far I only visited Duna and the MÃƒÂ¼n, because I mostly do planes.

I came here because I follow quite a lot of threads and I wanted to be more than a spectator and participate in the life of the forum and even of the game.

Now, if you want to know more about me I will be happy to answer all your questions

Hello Fluburtur, and welcome to the forums!

It's always a pleasure to welcome another lurker in from the cold recesses. Hope we make your time here enjoyable.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! Planes are pretty brilliant, aren't they? When I'm not designing rockets that ultimately blow up I love buzzing the buildings at KSC.

Hey there, welcome! I enjoy planes as well, just finished my first successful VTOL in career mode. Here it is as sunset hovering at 8000m:

Edited October 21, 2015 by Vanamonde
Fixed the pic

Thank you all for the warm welcome!

But dude your picture is broken
Welcome! I too like to plane, but I'm trying to get back into launching rockets. Never been outside Kerbin's SOI, though.
Welcome to the forums Fluburtur!,I'm building airplanes lately, especially VTOL, but always end crashed into the ground (my planes take off very badly due to unbalanced thrust)
Hello and welcome to the forums Fluburtur, hope you have some fun here!
